product_name: Nathan SpeedDraw Plus Handheld Water Bottle - 18 fl. oz.
long_description: Designed to rest comfortably in your hand, the SpeedDraw Plus offers great visibility with lightweight, black reflective fabric. It features a natural grip and easy-to-squeeze access to fluids.
short_description: Designed to rest comfortably in your hand, the SpeedDraw Plus offers great visibility with lightweight, black reflective fabric. It features a natural grip and easy-to-squeeze access to fluids.
